title: JPMorgan Chase, United Airlines, Netflix, and Other Stocks for Investors to Watch This Week
text:
Third-quarter earnings season ramps up this week, with 50 S&P 500 constituents releasing results. That’s followed by 110 the following week and 114 the week after that. Big banks are among the first companies to report: JPMorgan Chase, Goldman Sachs, Citigroup, and Wells Fargo kick off the week on Tuesday, followed by Bank of America on Wednesday and Morgan Stanley on Thursday. Other notable reporters include Johnson & Johnson, UnitedHealth Group, and United Airlines Holdings on Tuesday, Netflix and IBM on Wednesday, Honeywell International on Thursday, and American Express and Coca-Cola on Friday.

Economic...
description: Third-quarter earnings season ramps up, with big banks leading off. Data releases this week will address retail, housing, and the health of the broader economy.
